General.Name: Zhejiang Risun Intelligent Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhejiang Risun Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the material transmission, warehousing, logistics, and sorting systems in industrial production in China. The company offers automated, digital, and internal factory production logistics solutions. It also provides intelligent suspension production, hanging storage and sorting, non-suspension warehousing, and logistics system solutions. In addition, the company offers production management information software, fire-fighting smoke exhaust, and ventilation system. The company serves auto parts, garment, and home textile sewing industries. Zhejiang Risun Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Ningbo, China.
